about_the_game:
Welcome to MikoVerse! The ultimate universe for anyone that wants to create content, roleplay with others, and find their own place in a beautiful virtual world.

This is a FREE sandbox game that allows true customization of who you want to be and what story you want to tell. You can create your own experience or join others in the adventures they have created.

Become anyone or anything by selecting your own avatar using MikoVerse's existing in-game avatars. Go one step further by easily live-importing your own custom avatar without leaving the game. You can also buy avatars from the player marketplace.

MikoVerse will support many avatar formats and in the future you will be able to make your own avatar with our in-game character creator. Fully embody your avatar through a smartphone, webcam, or tracking suit. We are expanding the options as we develop.

MikoVerse is developed with specially designed tools to help you create. Upload your own custom assets to dress up your world and bring your vision to life. Customize the rules of your levels to design specific experiences, and even collaborate with others.

Create tabletop games, mini games, social experiences, building competitions, and more.

You will be able to set PvP, PvE, free to build and more when setting up the server. You can even tie game currency to certain rules, if you choose.

MikoVerse is perfect for people who love to create stories and want to share their visions with the world.

A lot of sandbox games are limited to primitive shapes and blocks. Here we are powered by user generated content and you can use ANYTHING as building materials. In our persistent servers, you can permanently construct anything you can imagine.

Unlike similar platforms that are graphically stale, MikoVerse pushes the boundaries with next-generation visuals thanks to Unreal Engine 5.

High Fidelity Networking

We are the ONLY platform that allows individuals to have true full-body tracking and their own custom animations to be multiplayer. MikoVerse's networking allows for over a hundred players in one game server with very detailed objects, environments and player avatars.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a sandbox game and players may pose their characters in arbitrary ways. This can lead to user generated shenanigans.

detailed_description:
ACCESS MIKOVERSE EARLY ALPHA!

Click request access above to download and play the MikoVerse Early Alpha!


AI Companion Creator

The AI Companion Creator is an extra feature available to everyone when you request access. (AI Companion Creator requires a subscription)

What is the AI Companion Creator?

With this feature, you can create your own AI characters by importing your VRM model or selecting from the character screen. You’ll be able to write custom prompts to design unique character personalities, creating NPC-like companions with rich, personal interactions. Picture creating NPCs with personalities of your design, brought to life with custom VRMs!

Subscription Details

The AI Companion Creator operates on a subscription model, where $23 per month grants you 1,000 interactions. CodeMiko also pays for AI interactions for her streams. To access this, simply go to the AI Character Creator section within the Mikoverse app. Keep in mind, this feature is in its early stages, and we’ll continue to improve and expand it over time.

A Few Notes

  • You don’t need the AI Companion Creator to enjoy Mikoverse Multiplayer.

  • This isn’t an AI art generator; you’ll need to use your own models or those available in Mikoverse.

Thank you for your support! For any questions or feedback, feel free to join us on Discord!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • VR Support: Partial

  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2080+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • VR Support: Partial
